ItemTooltips.staff_of_wizardry: A very nice boost for INT stat.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: Give you a nice INT And STR Boost with 2 demons to attack your foes.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Makes your wards a deadly freaking weapon!
ItemTooltips.refresher: you will be saying:How about A double ward session motherfuckers!!! DOUBLES YOUR ULT
ItemTooltips.sphere: Blocks Damage And helps alot against heavy casters!
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Give you mana when really needed can get you out of shit many time!
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Slow your enemies and have even more fun killing them.

AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_ether_shock: Shock the fuck out of your foes when maxed they will run and you will have total lane and creep domination.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_voodoo: Hex Your Foes PREVENTING THEM TO CAST!
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_shackles: SHACKLES YOUR FOES PREVENTING THE TO MOVE USE CLOSE TO YOUR TOWERS IF POSSIBLE FOR A FUNNY CHEAP SHOT.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward: Lol wards simply the best tower pushing tool and the best source of damage you can have! use each time your close to a tower or when in teamfight against big groups.
